externalDocs.description: See documentation for Akamai's Invoicing API

get.description: Returns invoices and credit memos for the specified contract and the selected month.
get.summary: List invoices and credit memos for a contract

externalDocs.description: See documentation for this operation in Akamai's Invoicing API

200.description: The response lists invoices and credit memos.

schema.description: List of invoices and credit memos.

items.description: List of invoices and credit memos.

contractId.description: Identifies the contract the data reflects.

files.description: Specifies invoice and credit memo files.

fileFormat.description: The format of the file, either `PDF`, `CSV`, or `JSON`.

invoiceCurrency.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 code indicating the currency that measures all totals.

invoiceDate.description: The invoice's or credit memo's published date, formatted as ISO 8601 date.

invoiceDueDate.description: The invoice's or credit memo's due date.

invoiceId.description: Identifies the invoice or credit memo.

invoiceType.description: The overall category for the document, such as `INVOICE` or `CREDIT_MEMO` for adjustments.

204.description: No content. No data to be returned for the requested parameters.

example.title: An incorrect request has been sent

errors.title: Field 'from' is invalid. Incorrect value: null

example.title: Not authorized

instance.description: The URL for this error occurrence.

requestTime.description: Request date expressed as an ISO 8601 timestamp.

example.title: User in current context cannot access resource
URL not found
Method not allowed
An unexpected error occurred during request processing

parameters.description: Selected billable usage period, expressed as an ISO 8601 datestamp (YYYY-MM).
parameters.name: month

parameters.description: For customers who manage more than one account, this [runs the operation from another account](https://techdocs.akamai.com/developer/docs/manage-many-accounts-with-one-api-client). The Identity and Access Management API provides a [list of available account switch keys](https://techdocs.akamai.com/iam-api/reference/get-client-account-switch-keys).
parameters.name: accountSwitchKey

parameters.description: Identifies the contract that you want to see aggregated data from.
parameters.name: contractId

get.description: Returns the content of the selected contract's invoice or credit memo file. The downloadable file is available in the response body. The `Content-Type` depends on the format of the file you're downloading.
get.summary: Download an invoice or a credit memo file

externalDocs.description: See documentation for this operation in Akamai's Invoicing API

204.description: No content. No data to be returned for the requested parameters.

example.title: Not authorized

instance.description: The URL for this error occurrence.

requestTime.description: Request date expressed as an ISO 8601 timestamp.

parameters.description: __Enum__ File format of the invoice. These are the available values: `PDF`, `CSV`, and `JSON`.
parameters.name: fileFormat

parameters.description: For customers who manage more than one account, this [runs the operation from another account](https://techdocs.akamai.com/developer/docs/manage-many-accounts-with-one-api-client). The Identity and Access Management API provides a [list of available account switch keys](https://techdocs.akamai.com/iam-api/reference/get-client-account-switch-keys).
parameters.name: accountSwitchKey

parameters.description: Identifies the invoice or credit memo that you want to download.
parameters.name: invoiceId

parameters.description: Identifies the contract that you want to see aggregated data from.

post.description: Creates a notification informing a set of users about new invoices or credit memos for a set of contracts. Each notification needs to specify a unique set of contracts. The request yields an error if the set of `contractId` values matches that of another notification.

externalDocs.description: See documentation for this operation in Akamai's Invoicing API

schema.description: Creation of invoice or credit memo notification.

contracts.description: The contracts for which the notification applies.

notificationStatus.description: Either `ACTIVE` to notify recipients about changes to invoices, or `SUSPENDED` to disable a notification.

schema.description: Specifies a set of people to notify whenever an invoice is available for a set of contracts.

contracts.description: The contracts for which the notification applies.

creationDate.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the notification's creation.

modificationDate.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the notification's most recent change.

notificationStatus.description: Either `ACTIVE` to notify recipients about changes to invoices, or `SUSPENDED` to disable a notification.

errors.title: Field 'from' is invalid. Incorrect value: null

example.title: Not authorized

An unexpected error occurred during request processing

get.description: Returns notifications for the current account. Notifications inform a set of users whenever there are changes to an invoice or credit memo.

items.description: Specifies a set of people to notify whenever an invoice is available for a set of contracts.

contracts.description: The contracts for which the notification applies.

creationDate.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the notification's creation.

modificationDate.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the notification's most recent change.

notificationStatus.description: Either `ACTIVE` to notify recipients about changes to invoices, or `SUSPENDED` to disable a notification.
